AudibleLight documentation#

Core API#

audiblelight.core.Scene(duration, mesh_path)

audiblelight.worldstate.WorldState(mesh[, ...])

Represents a 3D space defined by a mesh, microphone position(s), and emitter position(s)

Events and Emitters#

audiblelight.event.Event(filepath, alias[, ...])

Represents a single audio event taking place inside a Scene.

audiblelight.ambience.Ambience(channels, ...)

Represents persistent background noise for a Scene.

audiblelight.worldstate.Emitter(alias, ...)

Represents an individual position for a sound source within a mesh.

Microphones#

audiblelight.micarrays.MicArray([name, ...])

This is the base class for all microphone array types.

audiblelight.micarrays.Eigenmike32([name, ...])

Eigenmike 32 microphone.

audiblelight.micarrays.AmbeoVR([name, ...])

Sennheiser AmbeoVR microphone.

audiblelight.micarrays.MonoCapsule([name, ...])

A single mono microphone capsule

Synthesis#

audiblelight.synthesize.render_event_audio(...)

Renders audio for a given Event object.

audiblelight.synthesize.render_audio_for_all_scene_events(scene)

Renders audio for all Events associated with a given Scene object.

audiblelight.synthesize.generate_scene_audio_from_events(scene)

Generate complete audio from a scene, including all events and any background noise

audiblelight.synthesize.time_variant_convolution(...)

Performs time-variant convolution for given IRs and Event object

audiblelight.synthesize.time_invariant_convolution(...)

Convolve a static, time-invariant impulse response with an audio input.
